abstract: Neil Genzlinger Critic's Notebook constructs humorous cradle-to-grave narrative out of titles and themes of popular reality television shows.
snippet: Mine was a short life but an eventful one. So bizarre and unpredictable was it that I sometimes wonder if it was a dream, or a week of TV programming.
lead_paragraph: Mine was a short life but an eventful one. So bizarre and unpredictable was it that I sometimes wonder if it was a dream, or a week of TV programming.

headline.main: It Was Real, Cradle to Grave. Or Was It Just TV?
headline.print_headline: It Was Real, Cradle to Grave. Or Was It Just TV?
